body.name: Angel Soft Toilet Paper, 16 Mega Rolls

features: Every roll of Angel Soft Toilet Paper delivers a heavenly combination of softness and strength you can count on every time.
Each Mega Roll is equal to 4 Angel Soft Regular Rolls, so you can change the roll less often.
Mega Rolls deliver the long-lasting rolls you need at a price you’ll love. How divine!
Septic safe in well-maintained sewer and septic systems and made from SFI sustainably sourced trees.
Each pack contains 16 Mega Rolls with 320 2-ply sheets per roll.
body.description: Here’s something to harp on—Angel Soft Mega Rolls last and last with rolls that are 4 times as big as our Regular Rolls. With 320 2-ply sheets on every Mega Roll, you’ll always have plenty of the softness and strength you love on hand. Plus, each generously sized roll still fits harmoniously in most standard bathroom toilet paper holders. And like all your favorite Angel Soft products, our Mega Rolls are flushable and septic safe in well-maintained sewer and septic systems. Angel Soft Toilet Paper. Soft and strong. Simple.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #106 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #9 in Toilet Paper

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For a cloud-like experience, you don’t have to choose between a soft toilet paper and a strong one—Angel Soft Toilet Paper is a joyous balance of both. Our Mega Rolls are four times as big as our Regular Rolls, so you can change the roll less often! Angel Soft Toilet Paper breaks down easily after flushing and is safe for standard sewer and septic systems. Our sourcing practices are certified to the Sustainable Forestry Initiative (SFI) Fiber Sourcing Standard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY SOFT NON IRRITATING NO SCET DOES NOT DISINTIGRATE AND GOOD VALUE IN BULK
reviews.reviewText: I repurchase these every time as they have no scent and are not irritating to my mother who is very irritated with other toilet papers for some reason.Our family also like this angel soft tissue as it is the softest.Some of the lower priced toilet papers can feel like sand paper after a while..especially on a sore bottom.When you buy them in bulk, you pay as much per roll as the lower end toilet papers with… our coveted softness and non irritation.. I have even used this as Kleenex in a pinch for when I had a cold and my nose was really sore.. .and .. happy to say… no irritation and very absorbent..Things to improve on: the mega rolls don’t fit the regular toilet roll dispenser but..There is something called a Charmin Roll Extender that might help. See image 😊I agree with the below posted review:ORIGINAL REVIEWIntroduction:In the realm of bathroom essentials, few items are as vital as toilet paper. With a plethora of options available, Angel Soft Toilet Paper aims to stand out as a beacon of comfort, quality, and convenience. In this epic review, we'll unravel the merits of the Angel Soft 16 Mega Rolls, exploring its softness, durability, and overall performance to determine if it truly deserves a spot as your go-to bathroom companion.Softness (5/5):Angel Soft lives up to its name, delivering an unparalleled level of softness that transforms the mundane task of toilet paper into a luxurious experience. The texture is gentle on the skin, providing a velvety touch that feels like a spa retreat for your most sensitive areas. The sheets are thick enough to inspire confidence in their durability but maintain a delicate feel that elevates the overall bathroom experience.Durability (4.5/5):With 16 Mega Rolls in one package, Angel Soft proves it's not just about softness but also about endurance. The rolls are generously sized, ensuring longevity and reducing the frequency of replacements. The toilet paper holds up well during use, minimizing the risk of tearing or disintegration. While it may not be as robust as some ultra-thick varieties, it strikes a commendable balance between durability and comfort.Absorbency (4.5/5):One of the standout features of Angel Soft Toilet Paper is its impressive absorbency. The sheets effectively handle moisture, providing a clean and refreshing experience with each use. Whether for routine tasks or unexpected situations, this toilet paper offers reliable performance, giving you peace of mind in the most critical moments.Value for Money (4/5):The 16 Mega Rolls packaging not only ensures longevity but also offers value for money. While the upfront cost may seem higher than smaller packages, the reduced frequency of repurchasing makes it a cost-effective choice in the long run. Additionally, the quality of the paper justifies the price, as each use feels like a premium experience.Sustainability (4/5):In an era where environmental consciousness is paramount, Angel Soft doesn't disappoint. The toilet paper is made from responsibly sourced materials, and the packaging is designed to minimize waste. While it may not be the most eco-friendly option on the market, it strikes a reasonable balance between quality and sustainability.Conclusion:Angel Soft Toilet Paper, in its 16 Mega Rolls glory, emerges as a triumphant contender in the competitive world of bathroom essentials. With its heavenly softness, commendable durability, and overall value for money, it establishes itself as a top-tier choice for those who prioritize comfort without compromising practicality. Elevate your bathroom experience to new heights with Angel Soft, where each roll is not just a necessity but a small indulgence in everyday luxury.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and great buy
reviews.reviewText: This product is soft and durable. It is also a great buy for these mega rolls. I would definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bang for your buck
reviews.reviewText: This is by far my favorite brand! It's affordable and soft (but not too soft). If you haven't tried it, I encourage you do so! I've been using this brand nearly my whole life, and honestly, it is the only one I actually like using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These were priced so good I had to get them. I like that the tissue is strong and absorbent. As for softness, the tissue is comfortable and non-irritating but it's not the softest. The price and absorbency are the important things though. This pack will last a while because I don't have to use a lot every time to get the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our favorite toilet tissues. Always affordable and good quality. We have an old house though with cast iron pipes and when the grandkids come over, they use too much paper in the one bathroom that occasionally has issues so I've had to switch to 1000 paper in that one (what plumbers recommend in our area) but it works great in the other bathroom. It's usually not a problem. Hubby hates the 1000 lol but he likes this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price excellent paper
reviews.reviewText: TP. Better than supermarket prices, and you don’t have to lug it home. It arrives fast and lasts a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the size and softness. Very economical buy
